I feel like: \"That's not how the Force works!\" -Han Solo\n\nI am really disappointed in how this movie trashed everything TFA and all the other Star Wars movies created.  I still can't believe this movie was made.  What is more disturbing is how the \"critics\" rave about this movie.  Not only is it not a good Star Wars movie\, it is not a good movie PERIOD.  I am still upset a week after I watched this disaster.  I am never going to wear my Last Jedi shirt again.
